about_the_game:
The Digital Soundtrack for Fallen Legion: Rise to Glory contains 20 tracks straight from the game!

Track List:
01 Title
02 Striding Towards Glory
03 Blood and Roses
04 Leaves of Change
05 Frigid Clash
06 Through the Dark
07 Rushing Fortress
08 Ashed Ones
09 Golden Remains
10 Desolate Town
11 Black Shrouds
12 Elysian Finale
13 Ambush!
14 The Clouds Gather
15 Rain
16 Live and Die
17 They Overcome
18 Another Realm
19 An End to All
20 Blood and Roses (Demake)
